summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the acquisition of certain property and property rights in compliance with certain conditions imposed by franchise Ordinance No. 998 of the City of Renton; designating such acquisition as part of the additions and betterments contemplated by Ordinance No. 57856; making an appropriation from the Light Department Construction Fund therefor and repealing Ordinance No. 67957.
